backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: PWA-ready HTML entry point linking manifest, icons, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for StartGamePage and GamePage.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: Touch-friendly keypad UI with number buttons plus clear and submit actions.
Displays a player's name, score, and active-state styling in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Scrollable table showing mock turn history with player, score, and remaining points.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook wrapping Dfinity AuthClient to manage Internet Identity login state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind global style sheet defining design tokens, dark mode variables, and touch-friendly UI rules.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Provides types and utilities to save, load, and sanitize game settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Renders the game screen using loaded settings, showing players, keypad, and turn history with navigation back.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: Provides UI for configuring game mode, double-out, and player names, then saves settings and starts game.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, requirements, known issues, and existing implemented features.
